name: snoozebar
text: I could've lived my life without that image.

name: tekende
text: I find it has enriched my life in many ways, some of which are still being discovered to this day.

name: a_dude
text: A comment left by a_dude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Rhadamanthus, Overmedicated, totoro23, hikikomori, luckypyjamas, Darthemed)

name: luckypyjamas
text: he is a tiger

name: hawaiian_robot
text: tigers and cats both belong to the family Felidae

name: afterward
text: This is extremely accurate, probably.

name: atticusonline
text: Lyle is not a cool Felidae.

name: greenkoolayd
text: totally.  tigers cant roar.

name: cracklewater
text:
No, but they are masterful fuffers.

This is not a porn reference.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you were not in danger of convincing me that was not a pornographic reference until you mentioned that it was not.

name: gmm
text: Doesn't make him any cooler

name: glopdemon
text: What a bringdown.  I hope Teodor wasn't too attached to that bowl.

name: nurdbot
text: It isn't his, It belongs to Mr Bear. But he was quite attached to his Vinegar.

name: tellumo
text:
Knowing T, I'm thinking it's some high-end balsamic from Italy. There's probably like $8 worth of vinegar in that bowl.

Joke's on Lyle; balsamic vinegar is hell of sticky when it dries.

Eew. I'm going to stop thinking about that now.

name: envika
text: balsamic is the best kind.

name: farqussus
text: for douching?

name: tellumo
text: No, Valu-Douche is the best kind for douching!

name: brah_angelico
text:
But it's not "vinegar"
I don't see no Salt 'n' Valu-Douche flavored potato chips on the supermarket shelf

name: gunsofray
text: sticky cat scrotum smelling like vinegar.

name: superleahjane
text: Now his vinegar is attached to Lyle's sack.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: The music represented in the first strip is indeed the piano head of Dave Brubeck's "Take Five," one of my favorite jazz pieces.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: And of course by "strip" I mean "panel."

name: rad_chillies
text:
That's what I assumed it was, yeah, it looks like it. Haha, people who listen to Dave Brubeck do NOT mix with people who wash their junk with vinegar.

Yeah and someone should really try that and tell us what it's like.

name: killerlimpet
text: Can't be worse than doing it with acetone....

name: overmedicated
text: Or Listerine. Never try that ever.

name: jackparsons
text: Listerine kills germs that cause bad thoughts.

name: doomchild
text:
But does it agitate your free radicals?

DC

name: killerlimpet
text: I think by the time he got out of prison, Eugene Debs was totally in favor of Listerine.

name: fermatprime
text:
If I may forever prove my terribleness by quoting 4chan:

"feels good man"

name: rad_chillies
text: A comment left by rad_chillies was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pmoney187, GeyserShitdick, sandswipe, cailetshadow, sncether)

name: whuppins
text: I'm confused as to why you started doubting the definition of "panel" all of a sudden. It's not really an arbitrary thing; this is a three-panel strip. There has been a consensus on this usage for nearly a century.

name: rad_chillies
text: Yeah I probably should have gone to wikipedia right away.

name: molesticide
text: it's cool dude, you thought of a panel as being a collection of people in a row behind a desk with political opinions, critical notoriety, or fine culinary taste.  that's an easy mistake to make.

name: rowboat
text:
Though 99 percent of me immediately knew that you were wrong, rad_chillies, I admit that there was 1 percent of me which momentarily thought "Oh wow, I never knew this!"

It was over in seconds, but I don't think it speaks well of my intellectual constitution.

name: thesyndicate88
text: I'm really glad I'm not the only one who checked that. Take Five is hands down my fav jazz piece.

name: ashoykh
text: yes, but it's all the better when juxtaposed against an image of a tiger douching his tiger-junk.  nothing like dave brubeck to remind you that there are some who would not make testicle-tea in your vinegar.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Testicle Tea- the worst name ever for a jazz song. Never to be confused with Popsicle Toes.

name: mustconcentrate
text: A comment left by mustconcentrate was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rowboat, atypicaloracle, acefalco)

name: rowboat
text: Fuck do you care?

name: dcofosho224
text: comparing take five to smells like teen spirit is a very silly thing to do. very very very silly.

name: c_dizzle
text: Actually, Take Five was written by Paul Desmond. Sorry to be a party-pooper. You don't own a Real Book, I take it?

name: aghbar
text: Well, sure, but Paul Desmond was Dave Brubeck's alto player, so there.

name: beverage
text: this piece is what got me into jazz in the first place. listening right now

name: poodlelucy
text: it's not the head, the "head" of a tune is the melody. what's represented there is the intro. but it's still a great tune; it's one of my favorites as well.

name: philophobe
text: Look at Teodor's arm-crossing sadness in that first panel, though.  Doesn't it look like he's listening to Joy Division again?  Guess the Brubeck takes a few minutes to work its magic.

name: heatbag
text:
The alt text is right!
THIS is TOTALLY WONDERFUL!

name: stuart
text: Strip gets a 5 for the classic alt text.

name: hellofyellin
text: I saw this strip and cried tears of black ichor.

name: sargasm
text: Has anyone tried this? I mean, you never know

name: hollis
text: Wouldn't it hurt?

name: darthemed
text: That's how you know it's becoming clean. Like Scrubbing Bubbles!

name: mugi
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: pogo
text: Maybe a little irritation of the urethra, or the anus.

name: i_love_kate
text: URETHRAL IRRITATION

name: tekende
text:
LOVE IT

ITCHY

name: jackparsons
text: It makes crabs go away. The little tiny kind. That you don't get from a toilet.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: A comment left by djwhiterabbit was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, Krea, Pseudochron, tttt2, _cheesekayke, lux, sncether, pulkbaby)

name: morganization
text: gross.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Lyle is a terrible man.

name: straw
text: Tiger.

name: overmedicated
text:
Stuffed toy I AM YOUR MOM AND I TOOK YOU TO SCHOOL IN THE CAR OF PAIN.

SAY IT!

name: spinynorman
text:
How come Todd can be a terrible man (not to mention a colleague of Ray's) but Lyle is stuck being a Tiger?

How come?

name: junko
text: 5 for "Dude . . . DUDE!" That's about how I'd react.

name: varnish
text:
This was the strip I (accidentally) used to introduce my grandmother to Achewood.

She thought it was pretty damn funny, though.

name: envika
text: how do you do that accidentally, may i ask?

name: erinye
text: Your grandmother is my new favorite person.

name: henrythecad
text: A comment left by henrythecad was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by c_dizzle, SuperLeahJane, cailetshadow)

name: honesttom
text: I think the most disturbing thing is that he does it in what appears to be a communal area of the Achewood house. I mean, dude, baby living there!

name: semiquaver
text: What, Philippe a baby?  He is Five.

name: aelindil
text: I think he means Onstad's actual baby.

name: semiquaver
text: Oh god I am such a fool

name: aelindil
text: We all do this on occasion.  There comes a Time.

name: imbeta
text: THAT is TOTALLY RANK, is what it is.

name: superleahjane
text: Not anymore... it's been douched...

name: hcaz
text: A comment left by hcaz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by saddestking, waldo913, Semiquaver, molesticide, BrianNotBrian)

name: molesticide
text: stop

name: drventure
text: I believe that is the first time i have ever heard the term "man-douche"

name: achilleselbow
text: Why does Lyle need to man-douche? Is this related to his job of making trannies feel comfortable in their new bodies?

name: pogo
text: See the "crabs" entry above.  To remove parasites.

name: mystkmanat
text: So, from the blogs I was reading it seems like Lyle's job mostly involves him having sex with these trannies.  Is he basically a prostitute (with a heart of gold)?

name: luckypyjamas
text: lyle is all full of piss and vinegar

name: doubleclef
text: Yeah take five

name: jonmw
text: from now on, that bowl will smell like farted-in vinegar. Unfortunately for Teodor, he has already experienced that particular smell.

name: goatmasterflash
text:
maybe he's checking for warts

Admittedly, it is generous of me to assume this to be the case, and generous of me to think there's a chance he doesn't have HPV.

name: acefalco
text: At least Lyle apologized. Give credit where it's due.

name: rocketbunny
text: Oddly enough, this is most likely the only hygenic routine Lyle engages in that does not involve lukewarm congealed vomit and hobo urine. Thought provoking.

name: pan-optic
text:
So, apparently this "man-douching" business is actually incredibly unpleasant when done in real life. How do I know this? Well, let me break it down for you.
not the good way

name: aargh
text: What is a douche? Is this an American thing or is it something that has passed over my innocent little head?

name: mystkmanat
text: I'm pretty sure it's not just an American thing; the name is French so I would assume Europeans do it sometimes too? It is a pretty unpleasant notion. I will allow Dr. Wikipedia to explain.

name: johnmatrix
text: Wouldn't...wouldn't soap and water work better?

name: number6
text: This is one stuffed animal who isn't afraid to leave his shoes on while dipping his rad chillies into vinegar.  Respec'.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Lyle is like every godawful drunken jerk roommate I have ever had. All crapping in a sweatshirt in the hallway, all passing out naked on my bedroom floor while I'm at work, all squatting in a bowl of vinegar in my living room to clean his hella nasty sack. And I'd still rather live with a Lyle than a Todd.
